name: PT. BRODO GANESHA INDONESIA
description: Manufacturer of men's fashion and footwear products intended to provide stylish, well-made, and affordable footwear. The company offers a wide range of products, from formal and casual shoes, as well as sneakers and boots, enabling buyers to get better quality shoes from both online and retail stores.
one_liner: Manufacturer of men's fashion and footwear products intended to provide stylish, well-made, and affordable footwear. The company offers a wide range of products, from formal and casual shoes, as well as sneakers and boots, enabling buyers to get better quality shoes from both online and retail stores.
